傅.definition: (bound form) instructor; (literary) to instruct; to attach; to apply (makeup etc)

傅作義.definition: Fu Zuoyi (1895-1974), Guomindang general, subsequently PRC top general and politician

傅會.definition: variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]

傅說.definition: Fu Shuo (c. 14th century BC), legendary sage and principal minister of Shang ruler Wu Ding
